short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Facebook group members, one click to export Facebook group members to CSV/Excel/JSON file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract details of Facebook group members to find their designation, location, company name & domain.

The extracted data can then be used to generate high-quality leads. build custom FB audience for your FB ads, find & outreach via emails or send messages.

EXPORT COLUMNS
